items.sentence: Tom didn't realize that he was being followed.
Tom realized that Mary wasn't having much fun.
Tom realized that he didn't love Mary anymore.
Tom soon realized that he needed to help Mary.
Don't just sit there. Get up and do something.
Tom didn't use the flashlight that I lent him.
Do you think Tom had a good time in Australia?
Tom speaks Fench more fluently than Mary does.
If Tom had been there, he would've helped you.
Tom says that he often gets bullied at school.
